name: Examine password complexity policy - CentOS/RHEL 7.x
description: Lists the password complexity policy to console on CentOS/RHEL 7.x Linux.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: System must be CentOS or RHEL v7

data.command: if [ $(uname -a | grep -ioP 'el[0-9]' | grep -oP '[0-9]') -eq "7" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: System must be CentOS or RHEL v7

data.command: echo Please run from CentOS or RHEL v7

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: System must be CentOS or RHEL v7

data.command: if [ $(uname -a | grep -ioP 'el[0-9]' | grep -oP '[0-9]') -eq "7" ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
